1.Text: Gwahahaha! Drink up, you lot! Drink, drink!

Today's loot is a treasure trove! We can make a
killing pawning it all off in town!

Heheh. The spices look like they could fetch a
decent price. There's also this creepy watch I can't
quite make heads or tails of.

A watch? When did we get our hands on that? We just
nabbed whatever we could, so I'm not even sure what
we've got here.
Gwahahaha!
Gwahahahahaha! Hyahah!!!

Who the hell are you?! How long have you been
standing there?!

Well, you see, there's a reason I'm here. My stash
of gold coins was stolen.

I'm worried about getting scolded, so I thought I'd
show some good faith by collecting a small amount
from you bandits.

What the hell are you yapping on about... Hey, you
lot, take him out!

Whoa, that's a total side character line. I might
use it next time myself.
Dieeee!
Gah?!
Hmm, fragile. You really ought to get more calcium.
You bastard... I'll kill you! Hyaaaaaahhh!
Gugyaaagh?!
Oh...yikes. This magic belongs to...
...Cid.
...Ah, long time no see.
What are you doing here?

(Whoa, she's really pissed off. She's totally
gonna go off on me for running away.)

(Alpha looks terrifying. She's glaring so much.
I might burst into tears.)
Who are you people?

...I thought you would be here. Judging by this
amount of magic, you're no ordinary bandit.
Who?

You're not mercenaries. You don't look like thieves
either. What do you want?
I've been pursuing you, First Child Nanigashi.

I don't know what you're up to, but we received
intel about you sneaking around and mingling with a
group of thieves.
(We did?)

The source of the intel was dubious, so I half
doubted it was true.

I've heard of you. You're the Shadow Garden, aren't
you?
And if we were?

Not a problem. No matter who my opponent is,
the result will be the same if I bury 'em here.

I'll show you my strength as the First Child by
giving you a spectacular death!!!
Aghhh?!

That should do. He's not dead, so when he regains
consciousness, we'll interrogate him.

Hmm, that was anticlimactic. What was this old
geezer up to?

Let's check the cargo. Maybe something important is
mixed in.

...Doesn't seem like it. A few of these items could
be worth some money, but it really is just typical
bandit stuff.

(Whoa, incredible. I could sell these spices for
three silver coins. Being a thief is profitable,
huh?)
Hey, by the way.
Y-Yes!

What were you even doing here? What value is there
taking on low-level thieves now anyway?
W-Well...
(Fine, in that case...)
...There is value.
Huh?

I consider the cargo of these thievestohave
considerable value, so Ithought I'dgift it to you
guys.

(How's that?! Although it's nothing compared to the
amount of money that disappeared from the safe...)

(My strategy is to move her emotionally by conveying
in a pure and childish way that "It's valuable to
me!")

*gasp* I'm picking up on something! Some powerful
magic!

(Wh-What the heck is this... I didn't sense anything
until just now.)
It's under this cargo!

(Ah, this feels nostalgic. This is how I found Alpha
and Victoria back in the day.)
(Could it be another possessed child...?)
...What's this? It looks like a pocket watch.

So, this is the source of the magic...
Could it be...an artifact?
Whoa.

Was Nanigashi planning to present this to the Cult
and have them make him one of the Rounds?

*gasp* Wait, Shadow! Don't tell me you knew about
this from the start...!

When you said, "There is value," you were talking
about this artifact.

How do you do it? Even the Shadow Garden's
intelligence network didn't know about Nanigashi's
existence...

(...Not sure what's going on, but I did manage to
pull off my bluff. Boy, did I get lucky! Never hurts
to try!)
...Come here.
Huh?
What's wrong?
...Please, come here. I need...your power.
...Is it the watch talking?

(Hahah! This must be one of those scenarios where if
you break the seal as told, you end up in a binding
contract with some weird mascot character.)

(I guess these kinda clichs exist in any world,
huh? But that's usually part of the protagonist's
role, so it's definitely a no from me...)
Alpha, let me see it for a second.

(But if I pour all my magic into it instead of
breaking the seal...)
Shadow, what're you doing?!
(Maybe I can make it obey me instead!)

I mean, every shadowy organization should have some
kinda mascot, right?

2.Text: ...Huh? What is this place?
Graaarf?! Where's my boar?!
(Huh?)

Ugh... It's too bright... Direct sunlight after an
all-nighter is a total no-no...
What happened? I was just in the capital...

It looks like a peaceful countryside. We were
instantaneously transported from our previous
locations... It doesn't make any logical sense.

How strange. We were all in different places, but
now we're all together... Hey, Delta! Where are you
going?!
My boar is still around here somewhere...!

If that dumb dog is going off on her own, then I
might as well do the same. I need to gather intel to
understand our current situation.
No. Please avoid acting alone.
Lady Alpha?!

I don't know why this happened, but it's best if we
stick together for now.
The root cause is likely because Shadow
Huh?! What was that tremor...a magic collision?

It might be the aftermath of some kind of disturbance
at a distance we can't see, meaning a major battle
could be taking place somewhere nearby.

Is there some strong opponent here? Let's go check
it out!

It might provide us with some insight into the
situation. Let's gather intel while we're on the
move.
Ack... The difference in strength is too great...
Is there no way we can match its level...?
A ragtag bunch of nobodies...
Especially all of you. Hmph... Just filler, really.
...You sure about that?

We're all comrades here! We're not nobodies!
That's why

We will... I will...join forces with the others and
defeat you...to liberate the people from the
vampires...!
She's right.
Freya...

Today, we end this fight... We won't let the
vampires have their way anymore!

Vampires are also nobodies. Their existence is
insignificant...not that you lot would agree with
me.

...I grow tired of incessant chirping. The more your
numbers increase, the more bothersome it becomes.
Our numbers have increased...?

What in the world... I see familiar faces all around
me.

Where am I...? This doesn't look like the Academy
grounds...
Hey, what's going on?
I-I also have no clue...

You can make sense of things later. Now isn't the
time.
Who are you...?
How long have you been standing there...?
...Doesn't matter. I'll eradicate the lot of you.
*gasp*
This is bad...
Everyone, retreat!
Not happening!
Duet!
You are too weak to stand in my presence.

Huh, is that my sister and the others? Whew.
Thought I was alone here!
Cid?!
...What a tremendous amount of magic. Who are you?
Now disperse!!!
Ah.
Eeek?!
Wh-What strength!
It's going to blow us away...!
Ci...Cid!!!

3.Text:
The Massive Mound of Magic's attack hits Cid
directly. As the dust settles from the collision,
nothing remains at the point of impact.

Agh! It didn't even hit us directly, but what
incredible power...
Ack. My head hurts... I hit it against a rock...
Is everyone alright?!
A few of us are down.

...Lady Claire, Princess Rose. They're okay.
Just unconscious.
I-I see... That's a relief...
...Boss man.
Huh?
Where did Boss man go? Is he playing hide and seek?
Knowing Shadow, he should be...
...right there?
(I can't feel his presence.)

(Sure, it was a direct hit...but there's no way...
It can't be...)
Boss man...? Where is Boss man?

I-It can't be true, can it? He must be hiding
somewhere!
Master Shadow! Master Shadow?! Where are you?!

...You've got to be kidding. Master Shadow, beaten
by that guy...?
There's no trace of him...

His presence is...gone...but his magic is
unmistakable...
Master Shadoooow!!!

Shadow's magic is...in that...gigantic lump. It's as
if it's been swallowed up
That's one of its abilities.
Who are you?

There's notime for introductions.Itcan absorb its
opponent's magicand turn it into itsownpower.

It's already a formidable force, and now it's
absorbed the magic of a man who matches it in
strength...

What's everyone talking about? Boss man isn't dead.
No way he loses to someone like that.
Delta. I understand how you feel, but
Shut up! Boss man isn't dead!

Boss man is in there...! I wanna fight with him!
Grrraaahhh!!!
Delta?!

We'll destroy it before it finishes absorbing all of
Master Shadow's magic.
You too, Zeta...?!

Lady Alpha, I also... I absolutely cannot forgive
this!!!
Beta?!
Master Shadow... Give us back Master Shadow!

Lady Alpha, please don't stop us. I... I...!
Excuse me...!
Gamma... Eta, do you also intend to go?

It's hard to believe we can defeat the one who beat
him...but...no one can stop us...
Eta...

I feel the same... All of us Seven Shadows do...
right?
...Yes, we all feel the same. Let's go, Eta!

Lady Alpha and the others' pain must be immense,
considering how long they were with Mr. Shadow. Even
I feel so much pain...
We can't back down...not here.
What?
Even if my legs tremble...I must stand up...

I cannot allow myself to tremble in fear. As a
member of the organization Master Shadow built...I
will fight!

...Please wake up that unconscious woman over there.
She may not look it, but she's a reliable fighter.
Right, very well.

Let's fight a battle worthy of the Shadow Garden!
Hyaaah!

I don't know who you are, but now with our forces
assembled, this is the perfect opportunity!
Please wait, Pente! I have something to report!
A vampire army is approaching us!
A vampire army? What is going on?

Vampires are its underlings. They've sensed its
powers increasing and are now on the move.

They're coming to crush our resistance forces
fighting under the banner of the Church...
Let's fall back and regroup.
No, Freya, we mustn't fall back.

That's right. If we flee to a nearby city or fort,
they'll pursue us there. And then they'll harm
innocent people. We can't allow that... We strike
here.

Please wait. Against both the ever-more powerful
Diablos and the vampire army, we stand no chance of
victory.

Whether there's a chance or not doesn't really
interest me. If we're defeated, then that's that.
Olivier...

Let's fight. If we don't fight, the damage will be
severe. We need to protect everyone!

I'll protect the girls who are unconscious. Don't
worry about them and do what you need to do.

I can see them. No wonder they're called an army.
The sheer number of them... Let's go!
*pant, pant, pant...*
*pant...pant...pant...*

Alpha breathes heavily. She lets out a dry laugh
even as a single tear falls

Can you hear the battle cries of the vampires?
It seems they're finished as well.

They follow me without me even asking. It seems all
species grovel before the mighty.
(Delta, Beta, Eta, Zeta, Epsilon, Gamma...)

Only you remain. You must be feeling despair and
loneliness. But that, too, is about to end.
I guess you can no longer hear me.

(I didn't want them to be alone for their final
moments...so I managed to see each of them off...)
Now turn into dust.
Hey, Shadow...I did well, didn't I?

The Massive Mound of Magic's attack hits Alpha
directly, and her consciousness fades away.

4.Text: Boss man...? Where is Boss man?

I-It can't be true, can it? He must be hiding
somewhere!

(What is going on...? We were defeated. We should
have all died...)
Master Shadow! Master Shadow?! Where are you?!

...You've got to be kidding. Master Shadow, beaten
by that guy...?

(This interaction already happened... Next, Eta
should say)

(The same things are happening again... What's going
on? I know what will happen next.)

But there's no time for mourning. Time is of the
essence. That thing possesses a terrifying ability.
Who the heck are you?! You look like Lady Alpha!
Olivier...? That name and your appearance...
Is this person standing before us really...?
Save the talk for later. Now isn't the time.

It has the ability to absorb its opponent's magic
and turn it into itsownpower... Right now, it's
converting the vast amount of magic belonging to
that man. We must defeat it

Diablos, as in the demon Diablos...? Wasn't he
supposed to have died a thousand years ago...?

N-No. Diablos has been leading the vampires in this
world all this time...

These people are talking nonsense! Boss man isn't
dead!

U-Um, it may be hard to accept reality, but that man
is

Shut up! Boss man is stronger than that thing!
Boss man can't lose!

(This is bad... At this rate, Delta will rush off
like last time)

Everyone, please be rational. I know it's difficult,
but we need to consider our situation.

5.Text: That is the reality. Please accept it.

But...! How should I deal with this anger, this
emptiness, this sorrow...?!

Whether it truly is Diablos or not, the fact that it
defeated Shadow indicates it's an incredibly strong
foe. We will be decimated without proper intel and
preparation.

I feel the same as all of you. It's frustrating and
painful... I want to rush out there too. But

Don't forget the purpose of the Shadow Garden that
he created and what it is we're supposed to do! Put
aside personal feelings for now!
Urk... If you say so, Lady Alpha...
We must uphold Master Shadow's will...right...?
Everyone...
Thank you for understanding. Our next steps are to
Wrong! It's not true!
Delta...
Lady Alpha is lying!
Boss man isn't dead! He isn't dead!

All of you...you're acting weird! Do you actually
think Boss man lost?! Weird! Wrong! Boss man isn't
dead!

Delta...you must understand as well. Shadow is dead.
Think about what we need to do now.

Wrong...wrong...! Because...Boss man is strong,
amazing...and... Grrr...ugh...ughhh...aaahhh!!!
Grrrrraaahhh!!!
Delta? What's the matter?
Sh-She's transformed... A-And her aura as well...
Graaaaahhh!
Wha?! Stop, Delta!

It's more than just her aura that's changed.
It's like she's lost her mind. Now she's a...REALLY
dumb dog.

That's a lot of power... If she hits us, it could be
lethal.
Graaarrrr!
Delta!
Ack...!

(What strength...! This is clearly not the Delta
we're used to...)
Graaarrrr!!!
Eeek!

(This is bad. She's attacking everything and
everyone...)

Lady Alpha, what should we do? We can't handle Delta
in her current state!
She can't hear us... What's happened to her?

(If things continue like this, that thing will
finish absorbing Shadow's magic and start moving.
Can we handle it and Delta as well?)

(No, that would be impossible. If we try, we'll end
up with the same outcome. Then our only choice is
to)

Everyone, spread out and retreat. Those of you over
there, help the others who can't move. We're falling
back from the battle front!

Let's retreat as she says. That things' condition
has changed. We need to formulate a plan.
...Very well.
Where do we rendezvous?
For now, let's head to our base.
Sounds good. Just follow after one of us.

...Let's go with that. Everyone, make sure you get
there alive. That's an order.
Understood. We will carry out your orders.
...Hey.
What?

You're not thinking of doing anything strange,
are you?
...Of course not. What an odd thing to say.
(I will)
Head to the base.
Chase after Delta.

There's no time. Everyone, let's hurry up and get
moving.

6.Text: *huff* ... *huff* ...

Let's take a break for a moment. You were down until
just now, so you probably can't move well.
You don't need to worry about me. Let's keep going.

Worry? It's inefficient to keep moving while
fatigued. That's why I'm suggesting it.
There's no sign of the enemy in the vicinity.

Then let's take this opportunity to regroup and
share information.
Hold on. Why are you trying to take charge, Beta?

I'm not trying to take charge. Even in this
situation...you're still finding fault with me... I
was just making a suggestion.
Stop it, both of you.
Yes, ma'am...

I never imagined I'd be working alongside the Shadow
Garden...

Shadow Garden? Is that the name of your
organization?
Was that boy...a part of your organization?

No, he's not. He's just...Cid. An ordinary boy.
Nothing special about him.

I see... If Diablos hadn't targeted him, I would
have rushed in myself and been wiped out.
All because I lacked power...

Don't blame yourself. It hurts me too to see you
suffer... Let's mourn him together. I'll grieve his
death with you.
...This kind of irks me.

So, are you people not part of the Shadow Garden?
Who exactly are you, then?

Who are you people? I've never heard of the Shadow
Garden.

Perhaps a brief introduction is in order. I am Alpha
of the Shadow Garden.

Starting from this end, this is Beta, Epsilon, and
Eta.
I am Alexia Mid...no, of the Crimson Order.

My name is Olivier. These are my companions, Duet
and Pente.

Lady Alpha...I know this might sound absurd, but may
I speak?

What you're thinking is probably the same as what
I've been considering. I thought so the moment I saw
them.

The elf who calls herself Olivier and that Massive
Mound of Magic known as Diablos
Could we be...roughly 1000 years in the past?

That's a possibility. If the enemy's true identity
is the demon Diablos, then its strength makes
sense...though I'd hate to admit it.

Olivier, did you understand what they were just
discussing?
No, not at all.

It's strange, isn't it? Both what they're discussing
and their appearances...

Wait. What are you talking about? I can't understand
any of this.

The lack of understanding is mutual. And there's
another phenomenon I can't explain.
What phenomenon?
Well, it may sound absurd, but I'll be frank.
My time has been rewound.
Time...rewound...?!

Yes... Let's call it a timeline. In the first
timeline, everyone present was killed by Diablos and
the vampire army.
Vampire army...?

Diablos' reinforcements. I was the last one standing
before I was also killed at the hands of Diablos.

But the next moment, I was back at the moment Cid
died, and everyone started repeating the same words
from the first timeline.

Knowing we would end up following the same
timeline...I intercepted and announced we should
retreat.

I thought it was a bit strange. You seemed to be the
only one who was calm...
Do you believe me?
Of course. I trust what you say, Lady Alpha.
...It adds up...
Eta? What adds up?

...I've read documentation...about an artifact...
that can reverse time...
What?! There's such a thing?!

...Eta. Would it happen to be shaped like a pocket
watch?
Yes. A mysterious pocket watch.
I knew it...
Do you know something about it?

Yes. Before being thrown into this world, I was
hunting down Shadow and some bandits...

A First Child was in among the bandits, and the
artifact I found seemed to be in his possession.

Shadow infused magic into the artifact, and the next
thing I knew, we were in this world.
S-So, that's what happened...

...It's called the Irreversible Pocket Watch. It
sets a save point at any chosen location, and the
holder can time leap back to that point.

Time leap... but I'm not the holder of the artifact.
Why do I remember the previous timeline?

Only the holder and one other individual can retain
memories... How the second individual is chosen is
unclear...

But if Lady Alpha is not the holder, and she still
has her memories, then...

The Irreversible Pocket Watch must have been
activated by...someone close by.
There were us, the Seven Shadows, and No. 559

Myself, Claire, Princess Rose, Yukime, and these
girls.
There were ten of us there, including me.
Twenty-two individuals...

At least. There might have been someone hiding their
presence.

It will be difficult to identify the holder at this
stage.

Is the Irreversible Pocket Watch and the artifact
that transported us 1000 years into the past the
same?
Eta, what do you think?

...Artifacts are mysterious... but time-manipulating
artifacts are powerful and rare... It's unlikely
that there are two at the same time...

That makes sense... Then let's first focus on the
Irreversible Pocket Watch.

If we use the Irreversible Pocket Watch...we can
return to a time before there were any casualties...
before Master died...

Even death can be undone... Isn't that right,
Lady Alpha?

Yes. We were supposed to have died, but we are alive
again.

Wait a minute. Before Shadow died...? Wh-What does
that mean?
(...Right, so she doesn't know that Cid is Shadow.)

(It will be difficult to keep this a secret as we
continue working together.)

(But it was his will to keep his identity hidden.
We can't divulge his secret.)
(In that case...)
Yes. He was also defeated by Diablos.
*gasp*

That boy was taken down immediately after, without
any chance to resist.
N-No way... Shadow was defeated...?

(This could work. By reversing time, we can save
Shadow, and they can save Cid. Our goals align.)
(That said...)

The artifact holder... What were they thinking,
calling us to this era?

7.Text: We don't have time. Everyone, move quickly.

Are you hiding and waiting for an opportunity?
You underestimate me.

You're not targeting the local wildlife, but me...
Alpha.

Delta...I realize that we can't converse in your
current state.

I won't let you hurt our allies anymore...and I
won't lose you either!

Ack... There's a limit even to brute strength...
I'll show you, Delta...!

(Blood...My internal organs are also damaged...
Delta's must be as well...)

You intend to fight the army of vampires with that
body...?

...If you fight, then I'll fight too. No matter the
outcome, I won't abandon you, Delta.

With her battered body, Alpha heads to the
battlefield. Together with the rampaging Delta, she
attacks the vampires, but

Their bodies have already reached their limits. They
are overwhelmed by the advancing army of vampires
and perish

8.Text:
Past this forest, there's a small town. It's not
large, but you can get by there.

Normally, the presence of outsiders wouldn't raise
any eyebrows...but I can't say for certain with our
numbers.
The mood is...heavy...
Lady Alpha...um...oh, by the way!
Don't you think she and I look alike?
Huh? Me?
And her over there
I seem to resemble this girl, don't I?
Um...any complaints...?
Huh? Huh?! Why are you coming closer
I'm just checking...these!
Eeek?!
What the?!
Y-Your breasts...!
Huh, wait, get away from her!
A-Are you alright?

Unh... To be treated so roughly by someone I just
met...
I knew it... So, that's how it is...

Hey, you! You can't just suddenly start fondling
someone's breasts like that! What're you thinking?!
...Why...is it...
that only our faces are similar...!

You mean you don't look alike? I don't really get
it. Is there some part of you that isn't similar?

As far as I can tell, you look exactly alike,
just like us two.
What did you say?!
Huh?! Why are you getting angry all of a sudden?!

Because you don't understand anything! I didn't want
just our faces to be similar!

Huh? I don't understand what you mean. Why are you
so upset all of a sudden?
...Ugh... Pipe down...
I don't really understand, but fighting is not good.
This has nothing to do with you.

Well, true. But it feels strange to see a fight
between two with such similar faces.
The behavior I'm used to seeing is...

I was just so shocked to be treated like that.
Guess I'm overreacting...

Not at all. It's a totally natural reaction. I mean,
what she did to you...
Not even you, as my close friend, have done to me...
...Yes. At least never that roughly...
...Yeah, definitely irks me.

Seeing someone who looks like me be so intimate with
someone who looks like you...somehow feels off.

I feel the same. It also kind of irks me...or more
like creeps me out...
So, I guess they only look alike on the outside
Stop!
Hm?
This presence... She's coming!
Huh? Who's coming
Grrrrraaahhh!!!

9.Text: Ugh?! Ack... What a heavy blow...!

Agh...! She's attacking without even looking this
way...!

...No preparatory moves... She just attacked...
Delta's sharper...than she used to be.
Have her animal instincts been honed?
Delta! Stop! Why are you doing this?!

Graarrrr! Shut up!!! I'm stronger than you!
Don't order me around!!!

The weak die. The strong kill. That's it! That's all
there is to it!

It seems there's no reasoning with her. We have to
take her down. We'll subdue her by tying her up.

(She's powered up even more, maybe even more than
me)

I'll kill everyone! If I kill everyone, then I'm the
best! If I'm the best, then Boss man will praise me!

I'll kill you! Kill you! Kill you! Kill you! Kill
you! Kill you! Kill you! Kill you! Graaaaaaghhh!!!
That's all the time I can buy you.

10.Text:
(Maybe if I gave it more thought, I could find a way
to save Delta)

(Delta... You're like a real beast now. You're not
even aware of your own comrades you've hurt...)

(I'm sure you wouldn't want to go on living like
this, where you have to resort to killing your
friends...not that it's fair for me to use that as an
excuse.)
(This is my decision, my judgment, my will)

Delta...you...believed in him...that Shadow is
stronger than Diablos...

But I denied you...that trust. And you also trust in
me, so you were confused...

Having someone you trust affirm something you
believe to be impossible... I didn't realize how
cruel that was, that I had broken your heart...

It was my...judgment, that was wrong... Because of
that Eta, Epsilon, Beta, Delta...everyone...died...

Alpha is struck with a sensation as if blood is
boiling throughout her body. Amidst the pain and
despair, magic overflows outward

11.Text: For a split second, Alpha lets her guard down

Simultaneously, Delta's arm pierces through Alpha's
abdomen. Robbed of even a lingering moment of fading
consciousness, she perishes

12.Text: Boss man...? Where is Boss man?

I-It can't be true, can it? He must be hiding
somewhere!
Master Shadow! Master Shadow?! Where are you?!

...You've got to be kidding. Master Shadow, beaten
by that guy...?

She must be shocked about Master Shadow... After
all, Lady Alpha has been supporting him the
longest...
(We're back to before I had to kill Delta...)

Lady Alpha...oh-woof...it's okay! Boss man isn't
gonna lose to him! He's just playing hide-and-seek!
The one who can't see reality is this dumb dog.

It's time you faced reality. I don't want to keep
saying that he's dead.

This is no time for fighting or bemoaning. Time is
of the essence. That thing has a terrifying ability.
Who the heck are you?! You look like Lady Alpha!
...Is this really the time for introductions?

It has the ability to absorb its opponent's magic
and turn it into itsownpower... Right now, it's
converting the vast amount of magic belonging to
that man. We must defeat it

Diablos, as in the demon Diablos...? Wasn't he
supposed to have died a thousand years ago...?

I don't understand... And the appearances of those
girls, especially the one named Olivier...
Are these acquaintances of yours, Olivier?
All of you! Stop saying weird things!
Boss man is alive! He didn't die!

13.Text:
(If I confront them with the fact that Shadow is
dead, it might end up just like last time.)

(I don't understand why Delta ended up like that
just because she was confused, but I'll do anything
to prevent it.)
Everyone, this way.
Y-Yes, ma'am...
Shadow is...alive?
I-Is that really true?
Yes. More precisely, Shadow can be revived.

Revived... Revived... Graaarf? But that means Boss
man lost
Delta.

Naturally, revival is part of Shadow's plan. A death
that anticipates revival is not a defeat.
...Graaarf?

It's not a loss because he will be revived.
Do you understand?
Reviving means not losing...
Graaarf! I understand now!

I'm glad you understand. This matter is a secret
just among us in the Shadow Garden, alright?
Yes! Boss man's not dead! He's not dead!
Does she really understand...?

I don't want to doubt your judgment, but wasn't it a
mistake to tell that dumb dog?

...No, it was the right move. Let's leave this place
for now.
You're retreating too, right?
Hm?

Don't you sense it as well? An army of vampires is
approaching. If we stay here, we'll be attacked.

A strengthened Diablos and a vampire army... Are you
confident you can face both? I won't stop you, but
we're withdrawing.

(We were wiped out the first time. I won't make the
same mistake.)

Let's withdraw for now, Olivier. We can strategize
first and strike after.

As frustrating as it is, being threatened by
vampires is nothing new. Putting off subduing them
until later won't change matters.
Yes, that's right.
Tell everyone to retreat.
Um, where should we retreat to?
Where were all of you planning to go?

...There should be a town beyond the forest in that
direction.
That town is where our base is.
Then let us proceed there.
The vampire forces are coming into view...!
Let's hurry.

Please lend a hand to those who can't move on their
own!

If we're being pursued, it's dangerous for everyone
to move together. Let's split up and meet at the
base.
Good idea. Everyone, be careful

Those who escaped the battlefield gather one by one
at the base located in the town
We made it without incident!
...Long-distance travel is a hassle...

This distance is a hassle to you because you're
always cooped up.

...Doesn't matter the distance. For starters...
traveling itself is a hassle...

Restating it doesn't make it any more impressive,
you know.

If it weren't for...the princess...I could've been
carried...
Please walk on your own if you're conscious.

...Um, thank you for carrying me. I'm glad there
were no incidents.

The other two who fainted are also headed this way.
Someone from your group should be carrying them.

Who exactly are all of you anyway? I'm
sensing formidable strength from each of you.
As far as I can tell...you don't seem to be enemies.
(Wait...)
Has Delta arrived yet?
(Not again...)

...She ran off to the woods. Said something about
hunting wild boars...
How carefree of her...
Right...

(Shadow...no, Cid died right before her eyes,
causing her to lose her will.)
Lady Alpha!
Delta...wait, is that...
I caught a wild boar! It's food!
You really are oblivious, aren't you.
What'd you say?!

Stop it, both of you. ...More importantly, Zeta,
have you seen Gamma?

Gamma is checking out this base's warehouse to see
what they have and what they don't. I guess you can
call it an occupational disease.

I see... Zeta, gather everyone so I can explain
everything in detail.
Everyone?
Everyone from the same era.
What about Gamma?

She picks up on things fast, so I'll talk to her
personally later.
Alright. Got it.
That's what's been happening.

So, we just need to catch the mastermind using the
irreversible pocket watch and steal it from them.

Looks like our clue to returning to our original era
might also lie there.

...Interesting artifact... I'd like to study it in
the meantime...

Research comes later. We need to narrow down the
suspects first.

...So, using that artifact, Shadow and...Cid can be
revived...?
Yes, surely, Claire! Pooch will come back!

For his sake, I'll do anything. I'll defeat any
enemy...!

Yes, I feel the same. I will fight as much as needed
to revive him.

In even the most tragic of realities, the members of
the Shadow Seven keep looking forward... It was
immature to think they would lose their will. I will
dedicate body and soul to obtaining the artifact!

Hehehe. It seems there is a light at the end of the
tunnel. This must be what hope looks like.

(Hope... True. Everyone's face seems a little
brighter.)
This is all hard stuff...but more importantly
I'm hungryyyy!!!
...Ugh... Pipe down...

So, is that what they're discussing? Food?
How carefree they are.

Not everyone has gathered here yet, but should we
move to the base?

Neither Freya nor Lili are here yet. It seems not
all of you are here either.
What do you think, wait or prep a base first?

The latter seems more reasonable. We don't want to
waste time or accidentally miss them in our search.
Don't you have a base?

We have a small place, but with nearly double the
people, it'll be cramped.

Then let's find a larger place. There aren't many
that can accommodate nearly 20 people.
Agreed. There's someone I want to let rest soon
Ah, her
...Huh?

As Alpha and Olivier look at Claire, they see a
blade penetrate her stomach from behind.
*gasp* Huh...uh...Cid...
Claire...?!
Gamma...? What are you doing?!
What's with that look?!
(You have got to be kidding me...)

(Delta didn't rampage, so why is Gamma losing
control of her magic?)
(The future has changed...)
How dare you... How dare you do that to Claire!
What?! She blocked it...?!
It's my turn next.
Agh...ahh...!
Gamma sent her flying...?!

It's not just her look that's changed. She's gotten
stronger.
What's happening?! Gamma's power has increased!

Her movements are fast as well. She's a totally
different person now...!

(Just like Delta's abilities had increased, Gamma's
abilities have also been enhanced...)

Aha...hahaha! I see! So, this is how it feels to be
powerful!

To trample on and utterly destroy your opponent!
What a delightful feeling!
What are you talking about, Gamma?! This isn't like you...!
...Huh? Like me?
What do you mean by "like me"?
Gamma...?

Are you referring to me as the "weakest" of the
Shadow Garden?

Weaker than the rest of you, just earning money
rather than fighting, hiding in the shadowsis that
what you mean by "like me"?
Ack...!
Strategizing is ultimately a weapon of the weak!

Because even the smartest strategist will crumble
with a little push!
Even a baby could understand that!
Ack, Gamma! Stop!
You first!

Whoa... That was dangerous... Had to dodge that or I
would've been hit...
(We've got to stop Gamma somehow...)

(I don't want this to end the same way it did with
Delta!)
Grrr... You've got some nerve, Gamma...!
Looks like you're struggling.
Let us take over.
What?
We'll restrain her for now.
...Can you do it?

Yes, probably. I've been observing her fighting
style, and I think it's possible.

You looked down on me, didn't you?! I won't let that
happen anymore!

No, that's not true! I never thought of you that
way!
That's...a lie!!!
Ack...!

I'll blow you all the way to the moon and add
another crater!
I'll take over.
But...!
It's hard to fight one's kin.

It's okay. She has strength and speed, but I'm not
picking up on any real combat skills. As long as
there are no surprises, I should easily be able to
manage
Blegh?!
Gah?!
Huh.
What?
She...tripped, and...
Her sword stabbed...
No, aaaaaah!!!

14.Text: We made it without incident!
(Where am I...?)
...Long-distance travel is a hassle...

This distance is a hassle to you because you're
always cooped up.

...Doesn't matter the distance. For starters...
traveling itself is a hassle...
(I'm back here... The artifact was used again...)

(It looks like we've arrived at the base in town.
According to Eta's explanation, this point is the
save point...)

(Although Eta herself probably doesn't remember
explaining the artifact to me...)

(Claire Kagenou... She looks unwell, but she's
alive.)

(It's a strange feeling seeing someone alive who was
supposed to have died in front of me. The notion of
not having to fear death...)
(That's right...!)
Where is Gamma? Where is she?
Lady Alpha? What's wrong?

Gamma went to check out the warehouse. That dumb dog
ran off chasing boars during a time like this. What
an idiot.
...Where is the warehouse?
Do you need something from Gamma?

I need to discuss the details about Shadow's
resurrection with her. She needs to hear this too.

Master Shadow's...! How exactly will he be
resurrected?!
I'll explain that once everyone has gathered
Lady Alpha!
I caught a wild boar! It's food!

...Well done, Delta. I'm stepping out for a bit, so
stay put here.
Huh? Lady Alpha, where are you going?
To the warehouse. Gamma is there.
Warehouse? Gamma? But I smell Gamma nearby.
*gasp*
Around there
(It can't be...!)
Lady Alpha?
Ack...!
Not happening.
What's going on?
Lady Alpha blocked an attack... Wait, is that...?
Gamma...?

What's with that look? Why do you have such
malevolent magic...?

And why the sword? What were you planning to do with
that sword?!
(I'd hoped my fear was unfounded.)

(Gamma had already become like this before the save
point was established...)

Why...was I blocked...even with this power...? Am I
still the weakest...?
It can't be... It can't be true...!

I was supposed to have become the strongest...!
Capable of destroying everything...!

No matter how much a genius you are, if you get
stabbed in the heart with a sword, you'll die! Even
a baby should know that!
Am I weaker than a baby?! A-A babyyyy!!!
Huh?! Gamma, stop!

Ack... What strength... This Gamma is incomparable
to who she was before...!
Grrr... You've got some nerve, Gamma...!

All of you are always mocking me... I won't forgive
you!

(There's nothing we can do about events that
occurred before the save point...)

(It's the same as Shadow's death... Until we get the
time leap artifact, there's no going back...)

Ahahahaha! Haha, hahahaha! Blow away that genius'
heart!!!

Reddish-black magic... It seems the demonization has
begun.

Hmph, ridiculous. It's just a rampage of magic.
There's no meaning in power that can't be
controlled.

You say that, yet that power is exactly what we
seek. Let's rejoice in this moment.

Do not take your eyes off the events that unfold.
With that power, the day when our sublime goals will
be realized is nigh

15.Text:
Is there really a
First Child all the
way out here?

32.Text:
The only way to fix
Gamma is to find
that artifact...

31.Text:
That takes care of
Delta... But what's
wrong with Gamma?!

30.Text:
Delta will lose it
again... But don't
worry, Shadow lives.

29.Text:
Delta will lose it
again if I tell her
Shadow is dead

27.Text:
Delta's growing
stronger... I-I
may have no choice

26.Text:
Del...ta... If only
I was prepared...
to stop you...

25.Text:
Delta's growing
stronger...but I
won't kill her.

24.Text:
We must reach the
city... But Delta is
still after us...

28.Text:
Forgive me, Delta.
If only I could do
this over again...

22.Text:
Delta is not
herself... Retreat
to base for now!

21.Text:
Delta... Maybe I
should have joined
the others...

20.Text:
Delta is not
herself... Retreat!
I'll go after her...

19.Text:
I know what comes
next, but I must
choose carefully...

18.Text:
If Shadow lost, then
alone, my chances
are next to none...

17.Text:
Where are we, and
what is this power?
I worry for Shadow!

16.Text:
What was that bright
light? Seems Shadow
found an artifact...

23.Text:
One of them has the
artifact... Why were
we called here?
